Class LoginView

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.login.AbstractLogin
com.vaadin.flow.component.login.LoginOverlay
com.vaadin.starter.bakery.ui.views.login.LoginView
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasEnabled, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, com.vaadin.flow.router.AfterNavigationObserver, com.vaadin.flow.router.BeforeEnterObserver, com.vaadin.flow.router.internal.AfterNavigationHandler, com.vaadin.flow.router.internal.BeforeEnterHandler, Serializable
@Route public class LoginView extends com.vaadin.flow.component.login.LoginOverlay implements com.vaadin.flow.router.AfterNavigationObserver, com.vaadin.flow.router.BeforeEnterObserver
Login view component for user authentication in the bakery application.

This view provides the user authentication interface using Vaadin's LoginOverlay component. It handles user login, automatic redirection for authenticated users, and displays authentication errors.

Key features:

  • Internationalized login form with customizable text
  • Automatic redirection for already authenticated users
  • Error handling and display for failed authentication attempts
  • Integration with Spring Security authentication
  • Demo credentials display for development/testing

The view displays demo credentials for testing:

  • admin@vaadin.com / admin - Administrator access
  • barista@vaadin.com / barista - Barista access

Security behavior:

  • If user is already authenticated, redirects to StorefrontView
  • Shows login form overlay for unauthenticated users
  • Displays error message if authentication fails

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bakery Application

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginView

      public LoginView()
      Constructs the login view with internationalized content and demo credentials. Sets up the login form with translated labels and demo account information.

  • Method Details

    • beforeEnter

      public void beforeEnter(com.vaadin.flow.router.BeforeEnterEvent event)
      Navigation guard that handles authentication state before entering the view.

      This method is called before the user navigates to the login view. If the user is already authenticated, they are automatically redirected to the main storefront. Otherwise, the login overlay is displayed.

      Specified by:
      beforeEnter in interface com.vaadin.flow.router.internal.BeforeEnterHandler
      Parameters:
      event - the navigation event containing route and state information

    • afterNavigation

      public void afterNavigation(com.vaadin.flow.router.AfterNavigationEvent event)
      Post-navigation handler that displays authentication errors if present.

      This method is called after navigation to the login view is complete. It checks for an "error" query parameter in the URL and displays the login error state if authentication failed.

      Specified by:
      afterNavigation in interface com.vaadin.flow.router.internal.AfterNavigationHandler
      Parameters:
      event - the navigation event containing location and query parameters
